title: fix: update gptimage api-version for /images/edits support
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Fresh coat of paint
gist.blurb: We've updated the wiring for `gptimage`, bringing image editing and inpainting capabilities back online. Time to remix your masterpieces!
gist.summary: Updated the Azure API version for the `gptimage` model to fully support the `/images/edits` endpoint.
gist.impact: Restores functionality for image editing and inpainting workflows when using GPT-based models.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot as an artist. She is wearing a beret and holding a paintbrush, working on a canvas that represents the 'edit' functionality (perhaps painting over a glitch or adding a flower to an existing scene). The vibe is creative and restorative.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny painter's beret and holding a pixel paintbrush, adding bright lime green (#ecf874) details to a canvas on an easel. Soft pastel gradient background (mint to peach). Floating pixel icons of editing tools like brushes and crop frames. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'EDITS LIVE'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
